Subdivision.SubDescription: Huddleston Homes is a residential construction company that has the desire to build its customers dream homes. With over 50 years of experience in the building industry, Huddleston Homes knows what home buyers expect. Beavercreek is popular for military personnel as the city is nearby Wright-Patterson Air Force Base.
